message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 10% and we'll be done with this.
Alice, my turn. Let's be real - that last offer was ridiculous. I'm offering you $15 to wrap this up now.  Take it, and you'll at least get something.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 60/40 this time.  It's a better deal for both of us than what we've seen so far.
Okay, Alice, last chance. The clock is ticking and this money is practically worthless soon. I'm taking $70 - you can get $30 or nothing.
